description: An analytical overview of Donald Trump's potential stance on open source software, exploring how his broader technology and economic policies may intersect with open source principles like collaboration, transparency, and innovation. The discussion includes aspects of economic nationalism, cybersecurity, regulatory frameworks, and business perspectives related to open source.
keywords: Donald Trump, open source, technology policies, economic nationalism, cybersecurity, deregulation, open source software, innovation, intellectual property
title: Donald Trump and the Open Source Paradigm: An Analytical Overview
